description: This table contains information about presentation media type.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the finding record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PRES_MEDIA_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the category value for the type of image.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Letter Linked Image


Coronary Vessel Diagram


Coronary Vessel Image


Coronary Vessel Intervention Diagram


Coronary Vessel Intervention Image


Wall Score Legend Image

columns.name: PRES_DATA_POINTER
columns.description: Stores the location of the image.
